attributes.action: Reverse the marketisation of vital public institutions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Marketisation has become a relentless juggernaut,making inroads into area's  of our lives ,once considered off limits to the profit motive.
This includes services which should,provide for our most basic,and essential needs as a society.
Education, healthcare,etc,have been opened up to profiteers.
This involvement has brought no benefit to the public,the taxpayer or to employee's.  
Marketisation has created a system, which is inefficient,expensive and less answerable to the public.
Private companies prime motivation, is to owners and shareholders.The public good is not of paramount importance to such corporations.
In recent years, companies with no connection to health or education,have been selected, as providers of services,within these areas.Successive  governments have ensured, through use of the  tendering process,that  private companies are the preferred providers,of public services.
Our  public bodies, were created with, the ethos, of working for the public good.
